title: Demacia Party Brothers
body: Enjoy some brotherly Demacian Commando Justice (!!!) in 80s cartoon theme song form! Hope you like it, a lot of Garen playtime was put in to preserve the essence of righteousness intact.

replies.body:
I think my face just melted from the righteousness!  Also, I choose to believe that around 1:25 is when the keytar solo starts.  
This feels like the spiritual cousin to the Hasselhoff track, [True Survivor](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZTidn2dBYbY), and I am **totally **fine with that.

Tell me - were you wearing sweatbands and stone-wash jeans when making this?  I can almost hear them...

If only I had the money to incorporate The Hoffing into this. And every song afterwards.

Also, fingerless leather gloves. The only officially approved way of handling a keytar.
Leather fingerless gloves; of course!  I see you are a true 80s wizard.  Mad respect.

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=IJIs8XYE,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2015-05-08T23:33:37.461+0000)
>
> Leather fingerless gloves; of course!  I see you are a true 80s wizard.  Mad respect.

BROMACIA!

> This feels like the spiritual cousin to the Hasselhoff track, [True Survivor](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZTidn2dBYbY), and I am **totally **fine with that.
> 
> Tell me - were you wearing sweatbands and stone-wash jeans when making this?  I can almost hear them...

Legendary Skin: Keytar Solo Queue Garen skin confirmed
Taric cant join ?  cries in spanish.

Immediately made me think of Space Stallions:
